bitch.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: an insulting word for a woman that you dislike or think is unpleasant – also used humorously between friends
bitch.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: The silly bitch went and told the police.
bitch.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: something that causes problems or difficulties
bitch.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: I love that silk dress, but it’s a bitch to wash.
bitch.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to make unpleasant remarks about someone
bitch.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: He never bitches about other members of the team.
